title: build
description: A build from a continuous integration system

version.description: The version number of this JSON schema

job.description: The job associated with this object

job_id.description: The ID of the associated job

kernel.description: The kernel associated with this object

defconfig.description: The name of the defconfig built as reported by the continuous integration system

defconfig_full.description: The full name of the defconfig built, can contain also config fragments information

dirname.description: The name of the directory of the built; it can be different from the actual defconfig value

errors.description: Number of errors found in the build log

warnings.description: Number of warnings found in the build log

mismatches.description: Number of mismatched lines in the build log

build_time.description: The time taken to perform the build

git_url.description: The URL of the git web interface where the code used to build can be found

git_commit.description: The git SHA of the commit used for the build

git_describe.description: The name of the git describe command

build_platform.description: An array with info about the build platform

modules_size.description: Size in bytes of the modules file

dtb_dir_data.description: An array of file paths relative to the dtb directory

build_log.description: Name of the build log file in text format

build_log_size.description: Size in bytes of the build log file

system_map.description: Name of the system map file

system_map_size.description: Size in bytes of the system map file

kernel_config.description: Name of the kernel config file used

kernel_config_size.description: Size in bytes of of the kernel config file

kernel_image.description: Name of the kernel image created

kernel_image_size.description: Size in bytes of the kernel image file

file_server_url.description: The URL where boot log files, or other related files, are stored

file_server_resource.description: The server path where the boot related files are stored

vmlinux_bss_size.description: Size in bytes of the .bss ELF file section

vmlinux_data_size.description: Size in bytes of all the WA and A PROGBITS sections in the ELF file (the .data section)

vmlinux_file_size.description: The size in bytes of the ELF file

vmlinux_text_size.description: The size in bytes of the .text ELF file section

compiler.description: The name of the compiler used

compiler_version.description: The version of the compiler used

compiler_version_full.description: Full string of the compiler used (compiler, version, vendor numbering, ...)

cross_compile.description: The description of the cross-compile used

metadata.description: A free form object that can contain different properties
